title: [BUG] the application called an interface that was marshalled for a different thread
body:
**Description**

Throws exceptions on Windows

**Code**

I have no too much useful code samples to share, it's just an SKLottieViews in xaml. Works great on iOS and Android, but not on Windows

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  **2.88.3 of SkiaSharp** and **2.0.0-preview.61 of SkiaSharp.Extended.UI.MAUI**
- Last known good version:  unknown
- IDE:  The latest VS 2022
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41395390/221422011-37ed5436-39df-4013-bc4b-bded8bf18381.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41395390/221422029-9b61696b-2c52-4f5c-b578-627ce24d869b.png)
